snippet: A trade agreement between the United States and Europe will aid the economy and benefit consumers and businesses.
abstract: Editorial welcomes negotiations between American and European Union officials on new free-trade agreement, saying it could provide much-needed boost to world's two largest economies; suggests standardization of auto safety and emissions regulations and a scaling back of subsidies to airplane manufacturers.
lead_paragraph: A trade agreement between the United States and Europe will aid the economy and benefit consumers and businesses.
